senses.sense_definition: Describing land that has been ploughed but left unseeded to restore its fertility.

examples.text: The farmer decided to keep the <w>fallowed</w> field empty for another season to improve the soil.
Wildflowers began to grow sporadically across the <w>fallowed</w> land during the spring.

senses.sense_definition: Simple past and past participle of <w>fallow</w>.

examples.text: They <w>fallowed</w> the western plot last year to let the nutrients return to the earth.
After the harvest was complete, the workers <w>fallowed</w> the fields in preparation for the winter.
